short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple encoder/decoder for Base64, Hex, and URI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your web experience with en/de coder, a simple yet powerful Chrome extension designed to effortlessly encode and decode Base64 and Hex values, as well as escape and unescape URI components. Whether you're a developer, a security enthusiast, or just someone who frequently works with encoded data, this extension provides an intuitive and seamless interface to handle your encoding needs.

Key Features:
Base64 Encoding & Decoding: Easily convert text to Base64 format and decode Base64 strings back to their original form.
Hex Encoding & Decoding: Encode your text into hexadecimal format and decode hexadecimal strings with a click.
URI Escape & Unescape: Quickly escape URI components for safe inclusion in URLs, and unescape them when needed.
Copy to Clipboard: Conveniently copy the output to your clipboard with a single click for easy pasting elsewhere.
How to Use:
Select Encoding Type: Choose between Base64, Hex, or URI Escape tabs.
Input Text: Enter or paste your text into the input box.
Encode/Decode: Click the appropriate button to encode or decode your text.
Copy Output: Use the copy button to save the result to your clipboard.
Why en/de coder?
User-Friendly Interface: Clean, modern design that is easy to navigate.
Efficient: Instantly process your encoding and decoding tasks without any hassle.
Secure: No data is sent over the internet; everything is processed locally on your browser.
Enhance your productivity and streamline your workflow with en/de coder. Perfect for developers, testers, and anyone who deals with encoded data. Install now and experience the convenience of on-the-fly encoding and decoding!
